results.overview: Reg and Lindsay run an organic fertiliser business. They need a fresh supply of their "secret ingredient" to process through the meat grinder. Reg comes across two guys and a girl with a broken-down vehicle on their way to a music festival.
results.title: 100 Bloody Acres

results.overview: Boonie bears and Bald Qiang work together with secret primitive girl to smash a conspiracy to destroy old-growth forest.
results.title: Fantastica: A Boonie Bears Adventure

results.original_title: You Cast A Spell On Me
results.overview: Despite agreeing to an arranged marriage to a childhood friend, a successful businessman tries to track down a beautiful woman that he met at a Halloween party.
results.title: You Cast A Spell On Me

results.overview: The Aszú of Tokaj, a sweet wine of Hungary, was once cherished by King Louis XIV, Queen Victoria, Peter the Great, Goethe and Beethoven. But the world has since forgotten the noble Aszú, two world wars, the enforced collectivisation of the Communist regime and the deadly filoxera epidemic had all wreaked havoc on the vines. Three dedicated heroes, one passion: to create The Great Wine that can return to the most refined tables of the world.
results.title: Liquid Gold: In Quest of the Aszu of Tokaj

results.overview: A powerful man of a village kills a devotee on the eve of her wedding; he does this as his daughter is in love with the groom. He also seeks the help of an occult to acquire treasure until a neighboring deity comes to the rescue of this village.
results.title: Padai Veetu Amman

results.overview: In 1941, Hong Kong was the Casablanca of the East, a city full of war refugees, profiteers and spies. With the sudden attack by Japanese troops, a Canadian soldier's Christmas promise is broken during the Battle of Hong Kong.
results.title: Christmas at the Royal Hotel

results.overview: An orphaned boy named Tomás is adopted by Maire O’Donnell to live on a whimsical Irish isle filled with new friends, secret caves and a lost baby pup seal stranded on the coast. But when Maire's reluctant husband Alec refuses to accept Tomás as his own son, the boy drifts down a fateful path of adventure and self-discovery, illuminating how rainbows can shine around - and within - us all.
results.title: A Shine of Rainbows

results.overview: Mixing fiction and reality, filmmaker Mark Webber tells the story of a man who returns home from prison and attempts to rebuild his life in his impoverished Philadelphia neighborhood.
results.title: Flesh and Blood

results.original_title: Trials & Tribulations at the Bishfo: The Most Important Thing I Learned During My Time at Bishop Foley Catholic High School
results.overview: High School. Commonly referred to as the best years of one's life. In their latest "mockumentary", Green Fez takes you up close and personal with the high school students of today, guaranteeing a display of friendship, hardship, and a story worth exploring.
results.title: Trials & Tribulations at the Bishfo: The Most Important Thing I Learned During My Time at Bishop Foley Catholic High School

results.overview: Jack is on his way to grabbing the cash prize for an illegal car race in Mexico to California, when a desperate woman, fleeing from her gangster boyfriend who runs the tournament, jumps into his car pleading for help.
results.title: Fast and Fierce: Death Race

results.original_title: Toy Story at 20: To Infinity and Beyond
results.overview: Retrospective looking at the revolutionary computer-animated feature film Toy Story.
results.title: Toy Story at 20: To Infinity and Beyond

results.overview: An actor poses as a lawyer to help his sick friend, and problems develop.
results.title: Trial and Error

results.overview: Anbarasu, young and arrogant, and Nallasivam, damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.
results.title: Anbe Sivam

results.overview: When an uncompromising idealist and rich, arrogant heir cross paths, their contrasting beliefs begin to shift when they fall for each other.
results.title: A Liberal Passion

results.original_title: Captain Jokes Parrot: I Euresi tis Hamenis Atlantidas
results.overview: No Plot as of Yet.
results.title: Captain Jokes Parrot's Finding the Lost Atlantis

results.original_title: L'affaire Dreyfus, le Conseil de guerre en séance à Rennes
results.overview: The infamous Dreyfus is finally brought before a court martial.
results.title: The Court Martial at Rennes

results.overview: Aníbal Alencastro worked in different cinemas in Mato Grosso in the 1950s and 1960s. Now, he recalls stories related to the job of projectionist.
results.title: Anibal's Paradise

results.original_title: Dave Chappelle: What's in a Name?
results.overview: Dave Chappelle delivers a speech at his prestigious alma mater that reflects on his comedy roots, his rise to fame and why artists should never behave.
results.title: Dave Chappelle: What's in a Name?

results.overview: Philip Kwok plays a repentant killer who vows to destroy the masked gang of which he was a member. A young fighter and his martial arts brothers come to the town to catch the killers, but one of them is not to be trusted!
results.title: Masked Avengers

results.original_title: Viens chez moi, j’habite chez une copine
results.overview: Guy is fired from is job, and asks to stay with his friend and his girlfriend in their apartment. The longer he stays, the more disaster he creates.
results.title: Come to My Place, I Live at a Girlfriend's
